project.name: MMBase Notifications
project.description: The Notifications application provides basic functionality to implement a notification mechanism using MMBase objects. That means that you can make any object 'notifyable' by linking a 'notifyables' object to it. Website visitors can then subscribe to those notifyables and receive notifications if something happens with the notifyable. In practice this is for example used to send Short Message Service text message a certain time before the commence of certain TV program.
